meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Ben Hom Becky Schiavo Andrew Haringer Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7073.

td.p: Ben Hom, a defense consultant and Navy Reserve officer from Arlington, Virginia
Becky Schiavo, a college administrator from Warwick, New York
Andrew Haringer, a college instructor from Squamish, British Columbia, Canada (whose 4-day cash winnings total $72,399)

tr.td: SALUTE TO 7000
DEBUTING IN 1984
(Alex: That's when we started.)
BACK THEN NO ONE KNEW
THROUGH THE YEARS
ALWAYS IN FASHION
NEW TWISTS ON JEOPARDY! FAVORITES

tr.td: Nothing runs like this company's 7000 series tractors, up to 19 mph when loaded up
